# SSTV Decoder Web Application

## Project Overview
Next.js web application for real-time SSTV (Slow Scan Television) decoding from microphone input. Similar to Robot36 Android app functionality.

## Features
- Real-time microphone audio capture via Web Audio API
- SSTV signal decoding (Robot36, Martin M1, Scottie S1 modes)
- Live progressive image display on canvas
- Audio analysis using FFT
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Web Audio API
- Canvas API
